name: Pangya Mobile
storyline: Participate in the exciting tale of new traveler group, Marr, Arin and Tiki on an adventure to purify the world from a curse that has covered PANGYA island!
summary: PANGYA Mobile is a sports game, where you play Golf. In this game you will find yourself on the magical island of Pangya which was covered by a curse and now your task will be to cleanse the world of evil. Choose a character from the many in the game, by selecting the costumes, clubs and equipment. Choose your style and become a master of the game of Golf. Challenge your competitors in PVP mode and compete with them for the best results. Go through entertaining mini-games and earn rewards.
